name: M.A.D - Mandatory Assitance Droids
description:
M.A.D is a platform based game using a keyboard or controller. 

The game is single-player and Co-Op, but these are in the very early stages of the game. 

The only game mode that is fully functional is the Survival game mode. 

There are some bugs and animation problems with the game, but any other feedback is more than welcome!

Created by Toby Carlyon and Josh Couchman
